en-US: After clicking one of the buttons, you will be redirected to the donation page of the selected platform. Please remind that the donation platform is not affiliated with us, so please be careful when donating. If you're donating a large amount, we strongly recommend sending us a confirmation email to make sure we received your donation and put you on the list of supporters.
zh-CN: 点击其中一个按钮后，您将被重定向到所选平台的捐赠页面。请注意，捐赠平台与我们没有任何关联，因此在捐赠时请小心。如果您捐赠了大额款项，我们强烈建议您发送确认电子邮件，以确保我们收到了您的捐款，并将您正确登记。
